properties.sfomuseum:aircraft: Ryan NYP Spirit of St. Louis
properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating first solo transatlantic flight on May 20, 1927, at Roosevelt Field, New York, U.S.A., by Charles Lindbergh with Ryan Company “Spirit of St. Louis” monoplane; cancellation stamp dated May 20, 1984 at Roosevelt Field; includes information on reverse.
properties.wof:name: airmail flight cover: First solo transatlantic flight commemorative
